name: bnomei/kirby3-robots-txt
description: Manage the robots.txt from the Kirby config file

scripts.zip: rm kirby3-robots-txt.zip; composer update --ignore-platform-reqs; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; zip -r kirby3-robots-txt.zip . -x *.git*; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0' --ignore-platform-reqs; composer dumpautoload -o;
